title: Executive Order 6057-Authorizing the Appointment of Clara L. Hess
content: Clara L. Hess, who, since March 16, 1927, has been serving in a position in the Post Office Department excepted from civil-service requirements, may be appointed in the classified civil service without compliance with civil-service rules.
This order is issued upon the recommendation of the Postmaster General.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 6057-Authorizing the Appointment of Clara L. Hess Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361607
